name: R.A.T.T.Z. Maze
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a Mouse? Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be inside of a Maze? Wonder no more! In R.A.T.T.Z. Maze you will have to rely on the mouse to smell, and your brain to remember!

If you ever wanted to be experimented on, wait no more! R.A.T.T.Z. Maze is the control run for future testing. How fast can you finish all of the mazes?
How many rewards can you get? How much can you improve your runtime? Do your best, this is your control run!

Welcome to the Maze, Good luck!


-----------

What is this game about?
  • Experiencing the simple life of a Mouse.
  • Running around in cardboard mazes.
  • Getting a reward every time you find the button.
  • Seeing how much time it took to get as far as you did last run.
  • 12 starter levels to run through.
